players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. We need to vote her out now to protect the town."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso. Charlie is trying to deflect suspicion and push a false narrative quickly."
You: "Alice is not the mafioso. Charlie is pushing too hard and trying to frame me to save himself. We should be careful before voting him out."
Charlie: "Alice is lying to cover herself. We have no time for hesitation — the town's survival depends on removing her now."

Alice: "Alice is not the mafioso. Charlie is pushing too hard and trying to frame me to save himself. We should be careful before voting him out."
You: "Alice is lying to cover herself. We have no time for hesitation — the town's survival depends on removing her now."
